subject: p18512911
Findings: Again seen are bilateral lower lobe opacities, left greater than right. These have slightly changed their appearance and still could be due to either volume loss or infectious infiltrate. There are probable small bilateral effusions. There is mild pulmonary vascular redistribution and mild cardiomegaly.
